name: ArkInventory
Author: Scoots
description: Adds support for attunements.

name: ArkInventory Item Levels
Author: Xayia
description: A tiny extension for ArkInventory that overlays the item level on item buttons inside ArkInventory. Requires ArkInventory.

name: ArkInventory Tint Mod
Author: Xayia
description: Adds a clear red tint overlay to items in ArkInventory, based on the types you select. Requires ArkInventory.

name: AtlasLoot Mythic
Author: imevul
description: Adds mythic items to AtlasLoot.

name: Attune Helper
Author: Qt
description: Auto-equips attuneable gear and more.

name: AttuneProgress
Author: QT
description: Tracks attunement progress in inventory.

name: Droms Instance Timer
Author: Dromkal
description: Tracks how many instance you've entered in the last hour. Usage: /dit

name: [AI] Dual Class Colors
Author: Lulleh
description: Adds custom colors for Dual Class characters in chat and UI. Not compatable with ElveUI.

name: ElveUI
Author: QT
description: ElveUI Mod for Synastria by QT.

name: Forge Filter
Author: Xayia
description: A lightweight addon that helps you quickly find and filter Forged and Mythic items in the Auction House

name: [AI] ForgedItemLinks
Author: LiquidAP
description: Adds coloured [Tags] to linked forged and Mythic items in chat.

name: [AI] Mapster Fix
Author: Lulleh
description: Reallignment for the map finder for Mapster. Usage Examples: /ft x -220.5  or  /ft y -1

name: MSBT
Author: Mikord / QT
description: MSBT with truncated damage. E.G. 4,623,249 --> 4.6M

name: Postal
Author: Lulleh
description: Postal mod x10 faster 'Open All' speed.

name: Qt's Auto-Roller
Author: Qt
description: Automatically rolls for loot while in a group.

name: qtUITweaks
Author: Qt
description: Enhances Synastria base interfaces.

name: Questie
Author: Netrinil
description: Backport of Questie to work on 3.3.5a, further modified for Synastria features by Netrinil.

name: RaajikWarpAlias
Author: Raajik
description: To use, type /warp <2-12 characters of your destination> and the addon will attempt to auto-complete your warp's location if learned.

name: Scoots' Confirmation Skip
Author: Scoots
description: Skips confirmation for equipping BoE and looting BoP items.

name: Scoots' Craft
Author: Scoots
description: A complete overhaul of the profession UI.

name: Scoots' Quick Auction
Author: Scoots
description: Rapidly create auctions at a specified price.

name: Scoots' Rares
Author: Scoots
description: Creates a chat link to run .findnpc when near a rare.

name: Scoots' Speedrun
Author: Scoots
description: Instantly selects dialogue choices in dungeons.

name: Scoots' Stats
Author: Scoots
description: This adds a stat panel to the right of your character panel.

name: Scoots' Vendor Filter
Author: Scoots
description: Converts vendor to scrollable list.

name: Scoots' Vendor Forge
Author: Scoots
description: Continuously purchase vendor items until forged.

name: [AI] Synastria Build Manager
Author: Namira
description: Adds new button to the perk manager where you can export and import perks+talents.

name: [AI] Synastria Tooltip Enhancer
Author: Lulleh
description: Adds Tier and Redeem location to Tier tokens, flashing attune xp for visibility.

name: The Journal
Author: Qt
description: Dungeon Journal with Item and Boss Details.

name: TradeSkillInfo
Author: Netrinil
description: TradeSkillInfo addon with feature to show all required resource for remaining attunables.

name: [AI] VendorForgeList
Author: LiquidAP
description: VendorForgeList is a lightweight Synastria addon that allows you to find and filter attunable vendor items. Usage: /vfl

name: WarpRing
Author: Namira
description: Warp Ring UI.
